56.1.hd_quote: Expression of practical ideas that have value.
56.1.behavioral_axis: Wants to stimulate only with ideas that are useful to the listener.
56.1.shadow_axis: Trivial stimulation for feedback; talks before finishing idea.

56.2.hd_quote: Isolated genius that will eventually find continuity through recognition and support.
56.2.behavioral_axis: Projects ‘I can stimulate’ and eventually attracts the right field to do it.
56.2.shadow_axis: Feels unseen → overprojects stimulation without depth.

56.3.hd_quote: A will and egoism that often proves overbearing and guarantees continued isolation.
56.3.behavioral_axis: Wants to control how, when, and to whom the story is told.

56.4.hd_quote: The perfection of the superficial personality that can mask, when essential, its true feelings to secure protection.
56.4.behavioral_axis: Tells the story the audience can receive, not necessarily the one it believes.
56.4.shadow_axis: Becomes ‘just a performer’ and hides actual spirit.

56.5.hd_quote: Unusualness, innovation and sometimes genius as guarantees of eventually attracting attention and support.
56.5.behavioral_axis: Audience projects ‘you’re the storyteller’ → gets the mic → stimulates widely.
56.5.shadow_axis: Attracts attention that backfires; audience doubts the story.

56.6.hd_quote: The prudence, when linkage has been achieved, to honor its new commitments in order to secure its footing.
56.6.behavioral_axis: Will only stimulate when the idea is worth living and finishing.
56.6.shadow_axis: Cynical detachment; refuses to tell any story.
